sourceMeaningMnemonic: You don't want to keep all the <radical>alcohol</radical> to yourself (<radical>oneself</radical>), so you <kanji>distribute</kanji> it to all of your friends. Heck, not just your friends, to everyone you can find!
meaningInfo: Don't be that person who keeps the alcohol all to themselves. Distribute it to all of the legally-aged people you know!
readingMnemonic:
As you <kanji>distribute</kanji> the alcohol you say a <reading>hai</reading>ku (<ja>はい</ja>):

Here you go my friends
Alcohol for everyone
Never drink alone
readingInfo: This becomes the haiku you say before every party, every potluck, and every night out at the bar. You even get it tattoo'd to your arm.
